title: Top Places to visit in Kanchipuram, Tamil Nadu
content: Kanchipuram, also known as KƒÅnchi or Kancheepuram, is a temple city in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu in Tondaimandalam region, 72 km (45 mi) from Chennai – the capital of Tamil Nadu. The city covers an area of 11.605 km2 (4.481 sq mi) and had a population of 164,265 in 2011. It is the admi
